body.name: Fit Flask Soft Water Bottles, Running Hydration Water Bottle, Camping Flask, Collapsible - Ideal for travel, outdoor/indoor activities and everyday use, 2 Pack BPA-Free, 8.45oz/250ml
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 4 mins
features: Squeeze-and-Go Convenience: The innovative soft flask with light design lets you control liquid flow with ease, allowing you to hydrate effortlessly without interrupting your momentum.
User-friendly: just bite the silicone nozzle and gently squeeze the water pouch to enjoy a refreshing sip of your favorite drink.
Compact and Lightweight: Designed for portability, FitFlask soft flasks collapse for effortless storage in pockets, belt, vest, purse or in your backpack, ensuring hydration is always within reach.
Leak-Proof Design: Our soft water flasks feature a secure, leak-proof lid, providing spill-free hydration even during intense workouts and rugged terrains, so you can focus on pushing your limits.
Double the Options, Double the Hydration: Choose the 8.4 5oz/250ml or 16.9oz/500ml flask to match your needs for various activities and durations, ensuring you're prepared for any adventure.
BPA-Free Confidence: Crafted from top-quality BPA-free materials, the FitFlask guarantees pure, untainted hydration, supporting your health and well-being during every sip.
Enhance your Experience: we recommend to wash with dish soap and water before the first use.
body.description: Introducing FitFlask the BPA-Free Soft Flask Hydration Pack – a game-changer for active individuals who demand the best in on-the-go hydration. Crafted with precision for outdoor enthusiasts, this pack is designed to elevate your experience during every adventure. With two size variations, a compact 250ml flask, and a generous 500ml option, you're empowered to choose the perfect hydration companion for your needs. Unleash the power of convenience with our user-friendly design. Just bite the nozzle and gently squeeze the bottle to savor a crisp and rejuvenating sip of your preferred beverage. Whether you're conquering trails, cycling through scenic routes, or engaging in any adrenaline-pumping activity, the Soft Flask Hydration Pack is your steadfast companion, ensuring you stay fueled and refreshed throughout. Constructed with health-conscious materials, this hydration pack is proudly BPA-free, guaranteeing the purity of your drinks. Your safety and satisfaction are our top priorities, making this flask not only a reliable source of hydration but also a conscious choice for your well-being. To ensure an optimal experience, we recommend to wash with dish soap and water before the first use. This thoughtful step ensures that your Soft Flask Hydration Pack is ready to deliver pure and refreshing hydration from the very first sip. Upgrade your outdoor adventures with the BPA-Free Soft Flask Hydration Pack – where innovation meets functionality, and hydration becomes a seamless and enjoyable part of your active lifestyle.

productInformation.value: 3.6 3.6 out of 5 stars 10 ratings 3.6 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #47,521 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors) #1,158 in Water Bottles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and very portable
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I needed to take with me snowboarding and on hikes!I got the 500 ml. It’s perfect to put in a jacket as it’s not bulky at all (even when full) and can hold enough water to last through my hike. It’s also great to travel as it’s basically flat when empty and can be packed easily.I’ve been using it for a while and the build has been quite durable, so no issues there.Would recommend 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Works really well fits in most running vests... but the taste is horrible.
reviews.reviewText: I have used several water bladders before and never had a significant issue with chemical taste like this gives off. I rinsed it several times before using it and the first time I used it I didn't drink the water because it tasted like pool water (the water I put in it went through a 5 filter reverse osmosis system). I'm rinsing with baking soda then vinegar and soap to see if I can remove the chemical taste. If it doesn't come out within a few more rinses I will try to return them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars BAD BAD BAD PRODUCT
reviews.reviewText: Makes water taste like plastic. The nozzle had some kind of lubricant in it and can not be disassembled for cleaning. Would never buy or recommend again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fit flask is a water bottle that I highly recommend. It’s awesome for staying hydrated on the move. This thing totally lived up to my expectations ! The bottle material feels solid, and the spout doesn't drip at all. Worked like a charm with my running vest.Also, I washed it before using it for the first time, and everything was perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Practical Hydration for Active Lifestyles
reviews.reviewText: FitFlask has seamlessly become my reliable hydration companion, offering a space-efficient and durable design for activities like hikes, tennis matches, and runs. Its compact form folds conveniently, and the leak-proof construction ensures reliability. The user-friendly features extend to easy filling and dishwasher-safe cleaning. With a nod to sustainability, FitFlask's reusability makes it a sensible choice for those seeking a practical and dependable hydration solution.
